programs.name: Marriott Bonvoy
programs.summary: Massive global reach with 30 brands and 5th Night Free awards that stretch certificates and points.
programs.seoDescription: Explore Marriott Bonvoy elite tiers, certificates, and redemption strategies to maximize the world’s largest hotel program.
eliteLevels: Platinum Elite at 50 nights adds guaranteed 4pm late checkout and suite night awards
Titanium Elite at 75 nights unlocks annual Choice Benefits including 40K free night certificates
redemptionTips: Use 35K and 50K certificates at properties just above their cap by adding points with Top Off
Take advantage of PointSavers rates for popular city hotels during shoulder season
Book homes and villas with Bonvoy points when traditional hotels are sold out
coBrandedCards: Marriott Bonvoy Brilliant® American Express® Card

programs.name: World of Hyatt
programs.footprint: 1,300+ hotels with outsized luxury and all-inclusive partners
programs.summary: Low award rates, milestone rewards, and partnerships like Small Luxury Hotels make Hyatt points incredibly valuable.
programs.seoDescription: Learn how World of Hyatt milestones, suite upgrades, and transfer partners deliver unmatched value for award stays.
eliteLevels: Explorist at 30 nights offers suite upgrade priority and 2 club lounge access awards
Globalist at 60 nights provides free breakfast, waived resort fees, and Guest of Honor privileges
redemptionTips: Redeem 35,000 points for Category 7 luxury resorts like Park Hyatt Maldives during off-peak dates
Use Guest of Honor bookings to share Globalist benefits with friends and family
Transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards at a 1:1 ratio when you find premium suite availability
coBrandedCards: World of Hyatt Business Credit Card

programs.name: Hilton Honors
programs.summary: Dynamic pricing paired with automatic elite status from credit cards makes Hilton easy to engage with.
programs.seoDescription: Find out how Hilton Honors elite perks, free breakfast benefits, and 5th Night Free awards make points easy to spend.
eliteLevels: Gold status grants complimentary breakfast or food & beverage credit at most brands
Diamond status earns executive lounge access and premium Wi-Fi
redemptionTips: Take advantage of 5th Night Free on award bookings to drop the nightly cost
Stack Hilton Honors promotions with Amex Offers for paid stays
Use Points & Money awards when cash rates are modest but you want to save points
coBrandedCards: Hilton Honors American Express Aspire Card
Hilton Honors American Express Surpass® Card

programs.name: IHG One Rewards
programs.footprint: 6,000+ hotels with luxury brands like Regent and Six Senses
programs.summary: Revamped elite program with milestone choice awards, lounge access for top tiers, and a healthy pipeline of new luxury properties.
programs.seoDescription: Get up to speed on IHG One Rewards benefits, milestone choices, and sweet spots for the program's flexible award pricing.
eliteLevels: Platinum Elite grants Reward Night Discounts and welcome amenities
Diamond Elite unlocks free breakfast choice benefit and 100% bonus points
redemptionTips: Redeem free night certificates worth up to 40,000 points at InterContinental properties on weekends
Combine points with cash through the Points & Cash slider to stretch balances
Look for 15% discount promos on award stays when using an IHG credit card
coBrandedCards: IHG One Rewards Premier Credit Card
IHG One Rewards Traveler Credit Card

elitePaths.highlight: Fifth night free on award stays and 35k/50k free night certificates from co-branded cards.
Milestone rewards every 10 nights with suite upgrade awards at 50 and 60 nights.
Automatic Gold status with select credit cards, unlocking free breakfast worldwide.

bookingTips: Compare cash rates versus points with a simple cents-per-point formula.
Stack portal rebates, Amex Offers, or Mastercard promos for paid stays when points value is low.
Keep a spreadsheet of upcoming certificate expirations so you can plan weekend getaways in advance.
